barkeep.smalltalk.speaker: Barkeep
barkeep.smalltalk.text: Storm took the bridge last week.

barkeep.out_of_stock.speaker: Barkeep
barkeep.out_of_stock.text: Shelf is bare for that one.

scene.alarm.speaker: Crowd
scene.alarm.text: Heads turn. A whistle cuts the room.

stranger.share_rumor.speaker: Stranger
stranger.share_rumor.text: South alley. Third door. Watch the cat.
